name: ThePrivateSales
tag_list: fashion-online, online-shopping, luxury-designers, fashion-brands, best-online-deals, discounts-and-shopping-offers-on-shirts, online-shopping-fashion, trousers, shoes, perfumes, tops, skirts, t-shirts, belts, wallets, watches, jeans, sunglasses, bags, je
overview:
ThePrivateSales.com is an elitist destination that brings the best of fashion from ramps across the globe to your doorstep. We hold exclusive high couture sales events offering coveted luxury brands at discounted prices.

With our origins in the fashion capital, Paris and over 7 years of experience with designer brands & retailing, we started with a desire to make luxury affordable to privileged shoppers in India.

The first-of-its- kind in the Indian market, we offer you an opportunity to own genuine premium brands like Hugo Boss, Ralph Lauren, Esprit and Gucci, at unmatched prices, with more than 75% discounts.

With a growing base of loyal clientele, we are established as India premier online fashion boutique. Headquartered in Bangalore, India, we are equipped with an efficient delivery system to provide a satisfying shopping experience to our customers.

For More information, Please visit - http://www.theprivatesales.com
